title: National University of Singapore (NUS)
subtitle: School of Computing, Bachelor of Science, Business Analytics (Honours)) @Singapore
content: Developer Lead and Publicity Director for NUS Red Cross Youth – Led the development of a social-impact app for SG
Frontend Developer for NUSSU Venture Enterprise – Developed and managed Shopify store and generated over SGD $5k revenue
Software Engineer for NUS Social Impact Catalyst – Built a marketing website delivering poster auto-generation feature using VueJS

title: UBS AG
subtitle: Software Engineering Intern (Group Operations & Technology Office) @Hong Kong
content: Developed a proof-of-concept (POC) from scratch to simulate a rule engine system that verifies user input from a REST API against predefined business rules. Utilised Java, Spring Boot, Kafka, and Drools to complete the project
Tested the POC with the approaches of unit-testing and behaviour-driven development (BDD), using Junit and Cucumber
Documented the POC on a Confluence page, including detailed objectives, technical specs, and instructions for setup and execution
Delivered a comprehensive presentation with the audience of 10+ colleagues at directorial levels, garnered positive feedback

Initiated a data analysis project to evaluate a dataset generated by an established business system. Employed Python for conducting descriptive and predictive analytics, and provided recommendations to enhance the system's technical logic

title: LINK REIT (領展)
subtitle: Business Analytics Finance Intern @Hong Kong
content: Utilised SQL and PowerBI to develop, enhance, and maintain business-critical business intelligence dashboards and financial reports which are used across departments to keep track of transactional performance of the carparks that are under LINK

title: Vibefam
subtitle: Freelance Frontend Developer @Singapore
content: Improved the registration functionalities and created a customer journey map to boost the lead generation to the company’s system

Integrated the company’s system with the platform Classpass by implementing 5 suitable endpoints using Express and JavaScript with unit tests written in Jest so that Vibefam extends their service to this third-party platform
Managed the startup’s staff and membership platform by using VueJS and Google Firebase (i.e., Firestore and Cloud Functions)

title: Shopee Pte. Ltd.
subtitle: Frontend Developer Intern @Singapore
content: Developed web applications for more than 5 projects for designing reusable language systems and modules and converting UI/UX wireframes into prototypes to meet design goals using JavaScript, ReactJS and Redux under Shopee’s fast-paced environment

Collaborated with stakeholders from cross-functional teams, including designers, developers, and product managers to drive successful implementation of IT projects with the usage of Shopee’s internal API and product management tools Jira and Confluence
Researched and built technical prototypes involving new product features or technologies based on e-commerce product requirements
